title: Baguette Bread

adjectives: Of or pertaining to France or the people of France
Of or relating to the people or culture of France.
Of or relating to the French people.
Of or pertaining to France, the French people.
Of or relating to Gaul or France.
nouns: Narrow French stick loaf
A baguette is "a long thin loaf of French bread" that is commonly made from basic lean dough.
A variety of bread that is long and narrow in shape
A type of elongated french bread with a hard, crispy crust.
Baguette, a long thin loaf of bread.
A variety of bread that is long and narrow in shape.
A staple food prepared by cooking a dough of flour and water and possibly more ingredients
A common food made mainly from flour, water and yeast and produced by kneading and baking a dough.
Food made from dough of flour or meal and usually raised with yeast or baking powder and then baked
Bread is a staple food prepared by baking a dough of flour and water.
Bread is a staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water, usually by baking.
A foodstuff made by baking dough made from cereals.
Baked dough made from cereals.
Staple food
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: The long, thin loaf of a baguette, with scoring on its golden-brown crust. A bread commonly associated with France. May also be used to denote financial success, as per the slang term "let's get this bread".
apple_vendor_description: The baguette bread emoji on Apple devices presents a beautifully rendered, golden-brown crust with a distinctly crispy texture suggested by subtle shading and highlights. Its elongated, slightly curved form on Apple devices showcases smooth gradients and realistic lighting, evoking the artisanal quality of freshly baked bread. This emoji is perfect for conveying a love of food, a desire for a delicious meal, or simply adding a touch of culinary delight to conversations.
